snippet.title: Horn of Balance - trailer
snippet.description:
*This is an refined version of the trailer uploaded earlier this year*

Come explore this world of secrets and adventure. Featuring solid 2D Zelda-like gameplay, vast non-linear dungeons and a wholesome story about a young golem protagonist called Linden.

Look for us on Steam and Itch.io
